rows.label: qst103312_msg001
rows.name: 私が来た時には死んでました(仮)

rows.label: qst103312_msg101
rows.name: おそろしや(仮)

rows.label: qst103312_msg201
rows.name: まさか議員の方だったなんて(仮)

rows.label: qst103312_msg0001
rows.name:
Special Inquisitor Meleph...?
What can I do for you?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0002
rows.name:
Senator Saundra Arascain
was found murdered.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0003
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]M-my wife?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0004
rows.name:
You can't be serious.
Tell me you're joking.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0005
rows.name:
But...
Meleph-sama doesn't make
jokes, does she?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0006
rows.name:
Saundra...
My Saunie...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0007
rows.name: Did she have any enemies?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0008
rows.name:
She was...the fairest and most honest
person I know. I can't imagine what
anyone could possibly hold against her.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0009
rows.name:
Although, if I had to point the finger...
it would be those anti-imperialists.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0010
rows.name:
I hesitate to mention such things
in your presence, Special Inquisitor.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0011
rows.name:
But there are many who resent the
current regime and resort to violence
rather than reasoned debate.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0012
rows.name:
Of late, their efforts have grown
more organized. Some people are
beginning to take them seriously.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0013
rows.name:
My wife...Saunie was planning to
propose legislation to enact tighter
controls on such organizations.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0014
rows.name: Surely that couldn't be why...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0015
rows.name: Tell me, where did she...?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0016
rows.name:
My wife loved it there.
She often visited without
a security detail.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0017
rows.name:
But nobody would know that, save
myself and her secretary, Cruim.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0018
rows.name:
Cruim!
Cruim, are you here?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0019
rows.name:
Where could he have gotten to?
He's usually very prompt.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0020
rows.name:
You don't think...
Cruim?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0021
rows.name:
Saundra Arascain's body is being taken
to Military HQ.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0022
rows.name:
Would you please go and
take custody of it?

rows.label: qst103312_msg0023
rows.name:
We will take care of finding
this secretary.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0024
rows.name: Thank you, Meleph-sama.

rows.label: qst103312_msg0025
rows.name:
Ohhh, what am I going to
tell my son?
He's too young to understand...

rows.label: qst103312_msg0026
rows.name: Smùide Hot Spring.
